Articles.Content:
i'm not a fan of anime style characters

blasphemy how dare you insult anime

Now now Wolfy, no need to get snippy. It's like bluegrass music, I don't like it but he might. It's his taste and opinion and he has earned that. Wait until someone insults anime, then feel free to bite ^.^
or country music, i hate it and im from the South....

I suppose it's only a matter of time now till I have more off topic posts to cleanse from this thread.

Hopefully we at least get some new art progress before that happens.

hey odin, i hope you realize that closing the offtopic thread was a small mistake... also keeping this thread clean is like mowing the lawn in the south, you got to do it every weekend else it spirals out of control,

Hey chobit, what is the name for the separation WIP?
Haven't gotten that far yet, think I'll visit my grandfather then try to paint some more
I don't agree with Sabor. Other art styles make me feel nothing but Anime can make me feel angry, happy, excited, and peaceful.

Indeed. The simplistic styling and mainly the disproportional faces combine to allow more expressiveness and "characteristics" than any other art style I know of. Every style has its own advantages, but manga/anime is something special, beyond most other art, in my opinion.
So, a thunderstorm just rolled in and killed all my plans (sometimes lightning causes blackouts)

So, a thunderstorm just rolled in and killed all my plans (sometimes lightning causes blackouts)
It was pouring here. Didn't hear anything, though.

I was playing Minecraft, though, and I tend to zone while doing that...

That must be one big storm, because it just rolled in here, too.

EDIT FOR THREAD RELEVANCE: Now that 0.20's out, will we ever see any of the three riding the outside of a booster?
NO! I'm silly but not THAT silly ;P
So i hear Freya had a hard time trying to convince Jeb not to ride on the outside as they were aerobraking through Jools upper atmosphere before reaching Laythe....

So i hear Freya had a hard time trying to convince Jeb not to ride on the outside as they were aerobraking through Jools upper atmosphere before reaching Laythe....

Freya lost the argument.
nutt i wnat her to draw it... with Jeb hanging on outside of the window with freya looking out with a look of consternation on her face...
